response.overview: The day before Karim witnesses the murder and accidentally grabs a gun and runs away. The next day he hides it in a toilet cabin of the university he studies in and continues to study and hang out with his friends as nothing happened. Karim also plays at friend’s “A woman is a woman“ performance within the contest “Everybody has his own Godard“ having no idea that police and gun’s owners are after him.
response.title: KARIM LE FOU
